title: account question read the rest
body:
okay so i have 770 skin's omfg i know but
im an old man and chances are i may not live al ot longer, then i may, but if i die am ia ble to give my account to family/friend, or does it just sit there.
i keep trying to put in a  ticket it comes up with error.

replies.body:
For the ticket issue, try clearing you cache (For chrome, 3 dots top right > More tools > Clear browsing data > Cached Images and Files) and you hsould be able to submit properly.

As for the account, account sharing is technically against the ToS, but that said if you're gifting the account to a friend or family, Riot isn't really going to bother to take action on the account unless it's being used maliciously to ruin ranked games or the like. I wouldn't recommend someone else playing ranked on the account at all, but if it's only to play normals, there's little risk involved.
